It is Daily Remote's policy to respect your
privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website,
<https://dailyremote.com>, and other sites we own and operate.

We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a
service to you.

We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge
and consent.

We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be
used.

We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you
with your requested service.

You are free to refuse our request for your personal information, with the
understanding that we may be unable to provide you with some of your desired
services.
sharing:
We don’t share any personally identifying information publicly or with third-
parties, except when required to by law.
